enhanced_by.reason: The zip method can prepare pairs from two lists, which can then be used as input for the toMap method.

enhanced_by.method_name: forEach(Iterable<? extends Map.Entry<? extends K, ? extends V>>, BiConsumer<K, V>)
enhanced_by.reason: The forEach method can be used to verify the contents of the map created by the toMap method by iterating over the map entries.
